Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Amulet
Description: Tiny amulet in the shape of a standing feminine deity whose arms are alongside her body and whose head is crowned by a pair of horns encircling the solar disc. A hole for suspension has been pierced at the base of the emblem surmounting the head.
